Home.title: Front-end Developer
Home.body: I'm really passionate about crafting beautiful and functional web experiences. I specialize in React, TypeScript, and the latest web technologies.

Profile.title: Leonel Elizarraraz
Profile.AboutBody: I'm a passionate Front-end Developer who loves crafting responsive and user-friendly web applications. I specialize in modern JavaScript frameworks and libraries, always aiming to deliver top-notch, maintainable code that ensures exceptional user experiences.

Experience.title: Front-end Developer
Experience.subTitle: Implemental Systems • Sep 2023 — Feb 2024 (6 months)
body: Developed a multilingual section for Implemental Systems using Qwik and React
Utilized TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Vercel Analytics, and Cloudinary for video hosting
Implemented internationalization (i18n) for Spanish, English, and French languages

Experience.title: Mobile Developer
Experience.subTitle: Universidad de Colima • Sep 2022 — Aug 2023 (12 months)
body: Led the development of a React Native app for the University of Colima library
Applied Redux, Git, CSS, TypeScript, and React Native Paper
Enhanced digital library services with an easy-to-use and efficient UI

Experience.title: Intern
Experience.subTitle: COSITEC • Feb 2022 — Jul 2022 (6 months)
body: Finished database and testing courses on the Carlos Slim platform
Attended an in-depth Flutter course on Udemy to increase development skills
